mapper.sql: SELECT gc.id AS id, gc.sn AS sn, gc.type AS type, gc.status AS status, gc.start_date AS startDate, gc.end_date AS endDate, gc.create_time AS createTime, ( CASE WHEN gcu.user_type = '0' THEN ( SELECT ps.name FROM t_property_staff ps WHERE ps.id = gcu.user_id ) WHEN gcu.user_type = '1' THEN ( SELECT p.name FROM t_proprietor p WHERE p.id = gcu.user_id ) WHEN gcu.user_type = '2' THEN ( SELECT r.name FROM t_resident r WHERE r.id = gcu.user_id ) WHEN gcu.user_type = '3' THEN ( SELECT v.name FROM t_visitor v WHERE v.id = gcu.user_id ) WHEN gcu.user_type = '4' THEN ( SELECT a.name FROM t_attendant a WHERE a.id = gcu.user_id ) END ) AS userName, gc.project_id AS projectId, pr.full_name AS projectName, gc.oem_code AS oemCode FROM t_guard_card gc LEFT JOIN t_guard_card_user gcu ON gcu.card_id = gc.id LEFT JOIN t_project pr ON pr.id = gc.project_id
